title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6500.9 - Continuing obligations of award recipients
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6500.9 - Continuing obligations of award recipients

State Regulations
(a) NYSTAR may request that the award
recipient continue to provide to NYSTAR following termination of the contract
certain data and information about the progress achieved by the project, including without limitation the economic impact of the project. (b) To the extent that the contract provides
that revenues from royalties, licenses or other sources shall be payable to the

State, such payments may continue subsequent to the termination of the contract
as provided in the contract. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6500.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
